magpie.utility

Class CartesianSumGenerator<Type>

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.utility.CartesianSumGenerator<Type>
  • Type Parameters:
    Type - Data type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<java.util.List<Type>>

    public class CartesianSumGenerator<Type>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<java.util.List<Type>>
    Generate Cartesian sum of several collections. These are defined every possible combination of exactly one item from each set.
